p: Work performed by Ruffa et al. [ 27], which investigated the cytotoxic effects of the methanol extract of Schinus molle L. in concentrations ranging from 15 to 100 μg/mL for hepatic carcinoma cell cultures, demonstrated a dose-dependent cytotoxic effect and that the LD 50 of the studied cells was 50 ± 7 μg/mL. Thus, for the development of other tests, the concentrations to be tested were determined, based on LD 50 found for lymphocytes and macrophages, and these were LD 50, LD 50/10, LD 50/100, LD 50/1000, and LD 50/10000.
